Name: Battle Imagine - Brigand Archer
Description:
Use to activate or advance the Battle Imagine skill of the Brigand Archer - Stunt! Piercing Arrow.

Stunt! Piercing Arrow
Summon Elite - Brigand Archer, charging in place and releasing a piercing arrow towards the target, dealing Attack Damage.
Description$english:
Use to activate or advance the Battle Imagine skill of the Brigand Archer - Stunt! Piercing Arrow.

Stunt! Piercing Arrow
Summon Elite - Brigand Archer, charging in place and releasing a piercing arrow towards the target, dealing Attack Damage.
Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
